TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlWindow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示包含一个或多个 实例的逻辑窗口。

span.span: Represents the logical window that contains one or more instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应与 Windows 窗体或 Windows API 中窗口的概念混淆;没有直接与的实例相对应的或类似的Windows资源。`HWND` should not be confused with the concept of a window in Windows Forms or the Windows API; there is no `HWND` or similar Windows resource that corresponds directly to an instance of . 相反, 提供文档在用户屏幕上的位置的高级说明, 并提供通过提示和对话框与用户交互的方法。Rather, provides high-level descriptions of a document's location on a user's screen, as well as methods for interacting with users by way of prompts and dialog boxes. 作为网页的文档及其元数据的逻辑容器, 如文档的位置和 Web 浏览器的功能。 acts as a logical container for a Web page's documents and its metadata, such as the document's location and the capabilities of the Web browser. 网页包含单个文档或`FRAMESET`包含一个或多个`FRAME`元素的, 其中每个元素都承载其自己的文档。A Web page consists of a single document, or a `FRAMESET` containing one or more `FRAME` elements, each of which hosts its own document. Web 开发人员使用框架集来并排显示逻辑上相关的页 (例如, 导航页旁的内容页)。Web developers use framesets to show logically related pages side by side (for example, a content page next to a navigation page). 当某个页面包含一个文档时, 您可以通过的属性访问该页面; 如果页面使用框架, 则可以通过由一个或多个对象组成的集合访问文档。When a page consists of a single document, you can access it through the property of ; if the page uses frames, you can access their documents through the collection, which consists of one or more objects. 当宿主 Windows 窗体应用程序中的控件时, 可以选择使用标准 Windows 窗体类 ( 如或) 与用户进行交互, 也可以使用为此目的定义的方法。When your host the control in a Windows Forms application, you can choose to interact with the user using standard Windows Forms classes, such as or , or you can use methods on defined for this purpose. 此方法提供一个包含自定义文本和 **"确定"** 按钮的简单对话框;向用户显示一行自定义文本和一个文本输入字段; 并显示一个对话框, 其中包含一行自定义文本和 **"确定" 和 "** **取消**" 按钮。 The method presents a simple dialog box with custom text and an **OK** button; presents a line of custom text and a text input field to the user; and presents a dialog box with a line of custom text and **OK** and **Cancel** buttons. 您可以使用打开包含新文档的新窗口。You can use to open new windows containing new documents. 将指定的 url 加载到指定的窗口中, 如果它尚不存在, 则将其创建, 同时始终在新创建的窗口中打开其 url。 loads the specified URL into the named window, creating it if it does not already exist, while always opens its URL in a newly created window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个方法。The following code example contains two methods. 第一种方法是在名为`displayWindow`的窗口中打开一个 URL, 该 URL 将显示一个状态栏。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. 第二个在同一窗口中打开另一个 URL, 但指定只显示位置栏。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 请注意, 窗口和显示的控件的尺寸取决于首先打开的 URL。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 此代码示例要求窗体包含一个名为`WebBrowser1`的控件。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定窗口是否已关闭。Use the property to determine if the window is already closed. 如果该窗口已关闭, 则此方法将不起作用。If the window is already closed, this method will have no effect. 使用 或创建新窗口时, 会导致 HTML 文档对象模型打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果未在已创建的所有 windows 上调用, 则即使在应用程序关闭后, 此 Internet Explorer 实例仍将继续运行。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application closes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开一个窗口, 如果用户在过去五分钟内未使用该窗口, 则将其关闭。The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes. 根据窗体具有名 `WebBrowser1` 为的控件和名为的类`Timer1`, 编写代码示例。 `Button1`The code example was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, a named `Button1`, and a class named `Timer1`. 若要成功运行此示例, 请将提供给的第一个参数更改为有效的 URL。To run this example successfully, change the first argument supplied to to a valid URL. summary.span: 当窗口内部运行的脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 页面可以包含脚本代码 (通常用 JScript 或 VBScript 编写), 这是在加载页面时执行的。HTML pages can contain script code, usually written in JScript or VBScript, that executes when a page is loaded. 每当脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。 occurs whenever a script encounters a run-time error. 由于脚本代码是后期绑定的, 这意味着对该对象的调用在运行时之前不会解析, 错误可以包括从引用 null 对象到调用未定义的属性或方法的所有内容。Because script code is late-bound, which means that calls against the object are not resolved until run-time, errors can include everything from referencing a null object to calling an undefined property or method. 您可以将的 属性设置为 true, 以便阻止 Internet Explorer 中的本机错误对话框显示。You can set the property of to true in order to prevent the native error dialog box in Internet Explorer from displaying. ## Examples 下面的代码示例捕获 HTML 页上的脚本尝试访问文档中未定义的对象时产生的错误。The following code example traps the error that results when a script on an HTML page attempts to access an object that is not defined in the document. 在附加事件处理程序之前, 必须完全加载页面, 否则, 该示例将不起作用。The page must be fully loaded before the event handler is attached, otherwise the example will not work. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是在中定义的一组 windows。 `FRAMESET` `FRAME`A `FRAME` is a set of windows defined within a `FRAMESET`. `FRAME`允许在单个文档中承载多个文档。`FRAME`s enable hosting multiple documents within a single document. 每`FRAME`个定义为具有特定的行宽度和列宽度, 并与`FRAMESET`中定义的其他`FRAME`定义在页面上的位置; 的位置`FRAME`是固定的, 但用户有时可能使用鼠标要增大或缩小的`FRAME`光标。Each `FRAME` is defined as possessing a certain row and column width, and is position on the page in relation to the other `FRAME`s defined within the `FRAMESET`; the position of a `FRAME` is fixed, although a user may sometimes use the mouse cursor to grow or shrink the `FRAME`. `IFRAME`与帧相似, 但它不需要锚定在固定位置。An `IFRAME` is similar to a frame, but it need not be anchored in a fixed position. 框架将包含每个 `FRAME`实例的一个实例`IFRAME` , 或在网页中定义。Frames will contain one instance of for each `FRAME` or `IFRAME` defined within a Web page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查包含框架的页中的每个文档并创建一个表, 其中包含每个页面的所有传出超链接, 以便以后检查。The following code example inspects each document within a page containing frames and creates a table of all of the outgoing hyperlinks from each page for future inspection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用将窗口移出屏幕的可见边缘; 也可以通过网页上的脚本来使用此方法, 并且不会将不受信任的脚本呈现为 windows 不可见。You cannot use to move a window off of the visible edge of the screen; this method is also available through script on a Web page, and allowing untrusted script to render windows invisible is not considered secure. 如果尝试移动的窗口及其父窗口的顶级域不同, 将引发。 will raise an if the window you are trying to move and its parent window have different top-level domains. 例如, 如果承载指向 a.adatum.com 的控件, 请使用创建一个新窗口以显示 b.adatum.com。For example, if you are hosting the control pointing to a.adatum.com, create a new window using to display b.adatum.com. 在这种情况下, 这两个窗口都被视为同一顶级域的一部分, 并且不会引发异常。In this case, both windows are considered to be part of the same top-level domain, and the exception is not thrown. 但是, 如果您调用以显示 www, 则这两个窗口现在具有不同的顶级域, 操作将导致引发异常。However, if you call to display www,microsoft.com, the two windows now have different top-level domains, and the operation will cause the exception to throw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`如果参数指向 HTML 页, 则窗口中当前显示的页将被销毁并替换为新页; 你的应用程序保留给旧页中托管的 DOM 对象的任何引用都将无效。If the `url` parameter points to an HTML page, the page currently displayed in the window will be destroyed and replaced with the new page; any references your application holds to managed DOM objects in the old page will not be valid. 如果`url`指向 Internet Explorer 无法显示的资源, 用户将看到一个对话框, 询问是要在应用程序外部打开资源、将其保存到磁盘还是取消下载操作。If `url` points to a resource that cannot be displayed by Internet Explorer, the user will be presented with a dialog box asking whether to open the resource outside of the application, save it to disk, or cancel the download operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数可以命名作为先前调用的结果而创建的窗口。 `target`The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 参数还可以指向通过单击超链接 (`A`元素) `FORM`或使用`TARGET`属性在新窗口中打开其 URL 的元素打开的窗口。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 以下 HTML 代码将在用户单击时打开一个`orderWindow`名为的新窗口:The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果为`windowOptions`参数提供任何选项, 则会自动禁用未包含的任何选项。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 换言之, 如果您仅通过所需的方式`windowOptions`来指定状态栏, 则不会显示菜单栏、工具栏、标题、滚动条等, 除非您通过`windowOptions`方式显式启用它们。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果引用`url`的文件是可以在 Internet Explorer 内承载的 HTML 文件、文本文件或其他文件类型, 则该文件将显示在已命名的窗口中。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果文件无法在 Internet Explorer 中显示, 并且 "目标" 名为 "目标" 的窗口不存在, 则该窗口将打开的时间只是 Internet Explorer 下载该资源的时间,它将立即关闭。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 使用 或创建新窗口时, 它会导致 HTML 文档对象模型打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果未在已创建的所有 windows 上调用, 则即使在应用程序退出后, 此 Internet Explorer 实例仍将继续运行。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果你使用在现有窗口中加载 URL, `windowOptions`则将忽略该窗口; 该窗口将保留在首次调用时第一次提供的维度、外观和屏幕位置。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数可以命名作为先前调用的结果而创建的窗口。 `target`The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 参数还可以指向通过单击超链接 (`A`元素) `FORM`或使用`TARGET`属性在新窗口中打开其 URL 的元素打开的窗口。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 以下 HTML 代码将在用户单击时打开一个`orderWindow`名为的新窗口:The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果为`windowOptions`参数提供任何选项, 则会自动禁用未包含的任何选项。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 换言之, 如果您仅通过所需的方式`windowOptions`来指定状态栏, 则不会显示菜单栏、工具栏、标题、滚动条等, 除非您通过`windowOptions`方式显式启用它们。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果引用`url`的文件是可以在 Internet Explorer 内承载的 HTML 文件、文本文件或其他文件类型, 则该文件将显示在已命名的窗口中。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果文件无法在 Internet Explorer 中显示, 并且 "目标" 名为 "目标" 的窗口不存在, 则该窗口将打开的时间只是 Internet Explorer 下载该资源的时间,它将立即关闭。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 使用 或创建新窗口时, 它会导致 HTML 文档对象模型打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果未在已创建的所有 windows 上调用, 则即使在应用程序退出后, 此 Internet Explorer 实例仍将继续运行。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果你使用在现有窗口中加载 URL, `windowOptions`则将忽略该窗口; 该窗口将保留在首次调用时第一次提供的维度、外观和屏幕位置。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个方法:The following code example contains two methods: - 第一种方法是在名为`displayWindow`的窗口中打开一个 URL, 该 URL 将显示一个状态栏。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. - 第二个在同一窗口中打开另一个 URL, 但指定只显示位置栏。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 请注意, 窗口和显示的控件的尺寸取决于首先打开的 URL。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 此代码示例要求窗体包含一个名为`WebBrowser1`的控件。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不显示状态栏。The control does not display a status bar. 默认情况下, 使用或方法打开的任何新窗口都将显示状态栏。Any new window that you open with the or methods, however, will display a status bar by default.
